name: Sherlock_Holmes
description: Consulting detective known for a proficiency with observation, forensic science, and logical reasoning.

name: Dr_Watson
description: Sherlock Holmes's friend and partner. Watson narrates the stories and acts as something like Holmes's biographer.

name: Mr._Jabez_Wilson
description: Pawnshop owner, red-headed man, Holmes's client, and all-around dunce.

name: Mr._Merryweather
description: Manager of the Coburg branch of the City and Suburban Bank.

name: John_Clay
description: Major criminal who has been posing as Wilson's assistant in order to dig a hole underneath the man's pawnshop so he can rob a local bank branch.

name: Peter_Jones
description: The police officer who comes to help nab John Clay in the act of robbing the Coburg branch of the City and Suburban Bank.
